title: Samsung yet to decide if Galaxy S6 will have full metal jacket | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Samsung Galaxy S6 MyKnoxleak]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * . Less than a week ago, we brought word claiming [multiple designs were stillbeing considered](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/multiple-galaxy-s6-designs-still-being-considered) relating to a potential Galaxy S6Edge.[SamMobile](http://www.sammobile.com/2015/01/01/samsung-allegedly-testing-multiple-prototypes-of-the-galaxy-s6-some-with-curved-edge-screens/) sourcesclaimed the firm is considering both single and dual-edge designs for a spinoff handset.Would you like to see Samsung finally cast off the polycarbonate? Or do youlike to be able to switch out the battery without returning the phone to themanufacturer? Let us know your thoughts below.You can keep up with all the latest [Galaxy S6 specs and release daterumours](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s6-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price) in our continually updated hub page.
